name: BSCode
description: BSCode is a lightweight text editor for code. This is only a proof of concept application, and is not designed for practical use due to its bugginess.

name: PyInstaller GUI
description: This is a GUI version of PyInstaller. Freeze your Python code into an executable applicataion without having to use the command line.

name: AnonPost
description: AnonPost is a concept social media platform based around anonymity. The user can use any username to sign up, and can create as many accounts as they want to remain anonymous.
languages: Python, Flask, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, SQL, Node.js, Electron

name: math.java
description: Math.java is a math package in Java with a focus on vectors, trigonometry, and linear equations. It is made by me and 2 other people at my school to learn Java for my school's robotics club.

name: Tutor Center
description: Tutor Center is a website to find freelance tutors and help their business. It is a project made for the Hack The Cloud 2.0 hackathon.
languages: Python, Flask, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, SQL

name: Jason VSCode Theme
description: This is a minimalistic VSCode theme that looks good, and doesn't distract you from your code. It is now available in dark, light, and even lighter for the people that like to burn their eyes.

name: PythonMySequel
description: PythonMySequel is an object oriented MySQL connector for Python. It is designed to be easy to use, with Python code instead of SQL.

name: COV Ontario
description: COV Ontario is a website to see COVID-19 information in Ontario, while demonstrating the effectiveness of the COVID-19 vaccine.
languages: Python, Flask, HTTP requests, JavaScript, HTML, Bootstrap

name: Life Saver
description: Life Saver is a website that allows quick access to treatments for a variety of injuries and probable diagnoses based on symptoms.
